codeSystems.name: CHAllergyIntoleranceConditionValueSet
codeSystems.title: CH AllergyIntolerance Condition
codeSystems.description: CH AllergyIntolerance condition value set. This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms®  values  for values from the manifestation of reactions value set PLUS findings for the documentation of allergy or intolerances in conditions as problem-list or as encounter-diagnosis as well as its absence (no know allergies)

codeSystems.name: CHAllergyIntoleranceReactionManifestationValueSet
codeSystems.title: CH AllergyIntolerance Reaction Manifestation
codeSystems.description: CH AllergyIntolerance reaction manifestation value set, including codes values according to the Allergy Reaction (GPS) - IPS value set from SNOMED Clinical Terms®  for the documentation of manifestation of allergy or intolerance reactions

codeSystems.name: CHAllergyIntoleranceReactionSubstanceValueSet
codeSystems.title: CH AllergyIntolerance Reaction Substance
codeSystems.description: CH AllergyIntolerance reation substance value set. This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms® substances for the documentation of substancies of allergy or intolerance reactions

codeSystems.name: CHAllergyIntoleranceValueSet
codeSystems.title: CH AllergyIntolerance
codeSystems.description: CH AllergyIntolerance coding value set. This value set includes codes values  from SNOMED Clinical Terms® for no known [xy] allergies AND findings AND substances for the documentation of allergy or intolerance

codeSystems.name: BfsMedstats17Admitsource
codeSystems.title: BFS Medizinische Statistik - 17 1.2.V02 - Aufenthaltsort vor dem Eintritt / Séjour avant l’admission / Luogo di soggiorno prima dell’ammissione
codeSystems.description: BFS defines variables for medical statistic (german, french, italian) see [BFS](https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/de/home/statistiken/kataloge-datenbanken/publikationen.assetdetail.7066232.html). Unmittelbarer Aufenthaltsort vor dem Eintritt. Wo befand sich BFS der Patient / die Patientin?

codeSystems.name: BfsMedstats18Admittype
codeSystems.title: BFS Medizinische Statistik - 18 1.2.V03 - Eintrittsart / Mode d’admission / Genere di ricovero
codeSystems.description: BFS defines variables for medical statistic (german, french, italian) see [BFS](https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/de/home/statistiken/kataloge-datenbanken/publikationen.assetdetail.7066232.html). Beschreibung der Umstände des Eintritts. Wie wurde der BFS Patient / die Patientin aufgenommen?

codeSystems.name: BfsMedstats19Admitrole
codeSystems.title: BFS Medizinische Statistik - 19 1.2.V04 - Einweisende Instanz / Décision d’envoi / Istanza ricoverante
codeSystems.description: BFS defines variables for medical statistic (german, french, italian) see [BFS](https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/de/home/statistiken/kataloge-datenbanken/publikationen.assetdetail.7066232.html). Unmittelbarer Aufenthaltsort vor dem Eintritt. Wo befand sich BFS der Patient / die Patientin?
codeSystems.StructureDefinition-ch-ext-bfs-ms-admitr: BFS Extension Medical Statistic: Admit Role for Encounter

codeSystems.name: BfsMedstats21Encountertype
codeSystems.title: BFS Medizinische Statistik - 21 1.3.V02 - Klasse / Classe / Classe
codeSystems.description: BFS defines variables for medical statistic (german, french, italian) see [BFS](https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/de/home/statistiken/kataloge-datenbanken/publikationen.assetdetail.7066232.html). Im Rahmen des Spitalaufenthaltes belegte Liegeklasse, nicht BFS die Versicherungskategorie. Bei Wechsel der Klasse ist die im Wesentlichen beanspruchte Klasse anzugeben.

codeSystems.name: BfsMedstats27Dischargedecision
codeSystems.title: BFS Medizinische Statistik - 27 1.5.V02 - Entscheid für Austritt / Décision de sortie / Décisione dell’uscita
codeSystems.description: BFS defines variables for medical statistic (german, french, italian) see [BFS](https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/de/home/statistiken/kataloge-datenbanken/publikationen.assetdetail.7066232.html). Wer hat den Klinikaustritt veranlasst?
codeSystems.StructureDefinition-ch-ext-bfs-ms-discha: BFS Extension Medical Statistic: Discharge Décision for Encounter

codeSystems.name: BfsMedstats28Dischargedestination
codeSystems.title: BFS Medizinische Statistik - 28 1.5.V03 - Aufenthalt nach Austritt / Séjour après la sortie / Destinazione dopo l’uscita
codeSystems.description: BFS defines variables for medical statistic (german, french, italian) see [BFS](https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/de/home/statistiken/kataloge-datenbanken/publikationen.assetdetail.7066232.html). Wohin wurde der Patient entlassen?
codeSystems.StructureDefinition-ch-ext-bfs-ms-discha: BFS Extension Medical Statistic: Discharge Destination for Encounter

codeSystems.name: BfsMedstats29Dischargeencounter
codeSystems.title: BFS Medizinische Statistik - 29 1.5.V04 - Behandlung nach Austritt / Prise en charge après la sortie / Trattamento dopo l’uscita
codeSystems.description: BFS defines variables for medical statistic (german, french, italian) see [BFS](https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/de/home/statistiken/kataloge-datenbanken/publikationen.assetdetail.7066232.html). Behandlung, Pflege, Rehabilitation nach dem Spitalaufenthalt. Es geht darum, den Behandlungserfolg resp. den Abhängigkeitsgrad bei Austritt anzugeben. Nur die am besten zutreffende Kategorie auswählen.

codeSystems.name: ChCoreEncounterParticipationType
codeSystems.title: ChCoreEncounterParticipationType
codeSystems.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate how an individual participates in an encounter. In Switzerland the primary care physician is added to the extensible base ValueSet.

codeSystems.name: DocumentEntryClassCode
codeSystems.title: DocumentEntry.classCode
codeSystems.description: Document class as per EPRO-FDHA Annex 3

codeSystems.name: DocumentEntryConfidentialityCode
codeSystems.title: DocumentEntry.confidentialityCode
codeSystems.description: Document confidentiality as per Annex; EPRO-FDHA.

codeSystems.name: DocumentEntryFormatCode
codeSystems.title: DocumentEntry.formatCode
codeSystems.description: Document format as per Annex; EPRO-FDHA.       		This unambiguous code defines the format of the XDS document. Together with the mimetype, this should provide the potential consumer with sufficient information as to whether they are in a position to process the document.

codeSystems.name: DocumentEntryHealthcareFacilityTypeCode
codeSystems.title: DocumentEntry.healthcareFacilityTypeCode
codeSystems.description:
Type of healthcare facility as per Annex 3; EPRO-FDHA.
      This code describes the type of healthcare facility in which the document was compiled during the treatment process. In conjunction with the authorisation control, the patient can use this information to assign all documents from a specific type of healthcare facility to a specific confidentiality level in their rights and attributes, for example.

codeSystems.name: DocumentEntryLanguageCode
codeSystems.title: DocumentEntry.languageCode
codeSystems.description: Document language as per Annex 3 EPRO-FDHA. Defines the language in which the document was written.

codeSystems.name: DocumentEntryPracticeSettingCode
codeSystems.title: DocumentEntry.practiceSettingCode
codeSystems.description:
Medical specialisation of the data captured in the document as per Annex 3; EPRO-FDHA.
      This attribute assigns the contents of a document to a medical specialisation. It is conceivable that this information will assist the patient with setting or changing the confidentiality level of documents, which is relevant for controlling access.

codeSystems.name: DocumentEntryTypeCode
codeSystems.title: DocumentEntry.typeCode
codeSystems.description:
Type of document as per Annex 3 EPRO-FDHA.


The code defines a document’s type (e.g. discharge report, laboratory report). Each document type should be assigned to precisely one document class.
